responsibilities: Guide, drive, and implement machine learning applications and solutions across the organization.
Define and execute advanced machine learning models and algorithms to solve complex business problems.
Stay at the forefront of the latest machine learning research to improve Unity’s Ad platform capabilities.
Optimize, improve, and innovate ML practices to establish Unity as an industry leader.
Form and validate hypotheses on new modeling aspects and dataset potency for various use cases.
Drive optimization hypotheses by analyzing drivers for impactful ML solutions and building a development roadmap.
Communicate data and machine learning capability needs to product and engineering teams.
Drive the overall direction of machine learning for Ads to support strategic goals and vision.
qualifications: Expertise in modeling frameworks (e.g., Tensorflow, PyTorch) and understanding of model architectures.
Ability to explain machine learning and interpret modeling efficacy for improvements.
Capable of conducting analysis, statistics, and data literacy to identify challenges and opportunities.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on guiding, driving, and implementing machine learning applications and solutions, defining and executing advanced machine learning models, and staying at the forefront of machine learning research. The responsibilities also include optimizing and innovating ML practices, forming and validating hypotheses on modeling aspects, and driving the overall direction of machine learning for Ads. The skills required include expertise in modeling frameworks like Tensorflow and PyTorch, the ability to explain machine learning, and conducting analysis and statistics.

While the job involves advanced machine learning and model development, there is no specific mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) such as GPT or similar technologies. The focus seems to be on machine learning applications broadly, without a specific emphasis on generative or language model technologies.
